marketing_blurb: Hi, Spring fans! I am so excited to be returning to JFokus for 2023!
Hi, Spring fans! I am so excited to return to Devnexus 2023, to talk about Spring Boot 3
I'm so pleased to be appearing, for the first time since before the pandemic, at the Great International Developer Summit in beautiful Bangalore, India!
I'm so excited to be at the brand new Devoxx Greece event, speaking about Spring Boot 3!

hey, Devoxx UK, I'm back! This time I'll be talking about Spring Boot 3 in one talk and doing a special deep dive on Spring Boot's new GraalVM native image support with Oracle GraalVM developer advocate Alina Yurenko! Don't miss it!

Hola a todo el mundo! I'll be returning to Spring I/O, the unofficial SpringOne Europe, and I hope you'll join us there! There's a ton to see. I'll be looking at Spring Boot 3, of course, but I'll also be looking forward at what's to come, too. Do NOT miss this!
I'm so looking forward to returning to ITKonekt in Belgrade for the first time since before the pandemic!
I'll be speaking at the Taipei edition of the Taiwan JUG! Let's talk about Spring Boot 3.x and chou dofu together! https://webcommwebinar.kktix.cc/events/0616

event: Presentation on Spring Boot 3.x at the Microsoft Reactor in Sydney, Australia
marketing_blurb: Hi Sydney! I'll be speaking at the Microsoft Reactor on 20 June 2023 at 17:00! Register now https://connect.tanzu.vmware.com/Bootiful_Spring_Boot_3x_au.html
I hope to see you at this year's fabulous Devoxx show in Antwerp, Belgium!

event: Josh and James ward Boulder or Denver JUG
marketing_blurb: I'll be joining my friend and hero James Ward for this Boulder/Denver JUG appearance introducing the wide and wonderful opportunities for Spring Boot developers and Kotlin users
I'll be in Salt Lake City, UT, bringing the Spring at the local JUG, and I can't wait to see you there, too.
